external_games.name: Dungeon Defenders Warping Core Challenge Mission Pack

name: Dungeon Defenders: Warping Core Challenge Mission Pack
summary: Ready for even more of a challenge? This Dungeon Defenders Challenge pack contains 4 new warping core missions for you to tackle with your friends as well as unique loot that can only be obtained by beating these missions! Warping Core Challenges are on: Royal Gardens Endless Spires Castle Armory Hall of Court
